alert.note: Alert for Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Georgetown and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Indiantown, or 12 miles east of Kingstree, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rhems, Nesmith, Morrisville, Indiantown, Henry and Stuckey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
